message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950,000.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $900,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant. How about we meet in the middle at $925,000?
I see that you're standing firm on your valuation. I'm willing to go up to $910,000 for the product, which is a compromise between our positions.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, I can't let this go for less than $915,000.  This is my final offer.
